summary: THE CONSUMER WAS DRIVING 20 MPH AROUND A CORNER. WHEN THE CONSUMER ATTEMPTED TO ACCELERATE THE VEHICLE BEGAN TO BUCK, THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED AND THE CAR SUDDENLY STALLED.  THE DEALER DIAGNOSED THAT THE UPPER INTAKE MANIFOLD GASKET FAILED.   *NLM   THE PLENUM FAILED AND CAUSED COOLANT TO ENTER THE ENGINE.  THE ENGINE HYDRO-LOCKED DUE TO A FAULTY GASKET THAT GM HAD KNOWN ABOUT.  THE ENGINE, STARTER AND PLENUM WAS REPLACED.   *SCC  *JB
